original_title: Missing in Action: The LTC Don Faith Story
overview: Documentary - This is a EMMY winning true story of LTC Don Faith an infantry commander during the Korean war and Medal of Honor recipient. This short documentary highlights LTC Faith's heroic actions in North Korea that led to his death and his posthumous Medal of Honor. He was later deemed Missing in Action. This is the story of how they found his remains and brought him back to the US many years later. -
title: Missing in Action: The LTC Don Faith Story
